channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2023090386
item.description:
Report X-2023090386

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the box in the hazmat cage. upon inspection found 4 inner plastic bottles three have loose caps with one of the three missing the cap. DescribePack: one of the three bottles is missing the cap. and 2 have loose caps. the fourth is not leaking.. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into the hazmat cage. the spill was dried with a liquid absorber.
